com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.proxy.core

Class JRoutineProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gh.bmd.jrt.proxy.core.JRoutineProxy
      • com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.proxy.core.JRoutineProxy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JRoutineProxy, JRoutineProxy

    public class JRoutineProxy
extends JRoutineProxy
    Utility class used to create builders of objects wrapping target ones, so to enable asynchronous calls of their methods in a dedicated service.

    The builders returned by this class are based on compile time code generation, enabled by pre-processing of Java annotations.
    The pre-processing is automatically triggered just by including the artifact of this class module.

    Created by davide-maestroni on 13/05/15.

    See Also:
    ServiceProxy, Alias, Param, ShareGroup, Timeout, TimeoutAction

      static ServiceProxyRoutineBuilder onService(Context context, Class<?> target)
      Returns a builder of routines running in a service based on the specified context, wrapping the specified object instances.
      In order to customize the object creation, the caller must employ an implementation of a FactoryContext as the invocation service.

    • Method Detail

      • onService

        @Nonnull
public static ServiceProxyRoutineBuilder onService(@Nonnull
                                           Context context,
                                           @Nonnull
                                           Class<?> target)
        Returns a builder of routines running in a service based on the specified context, wrapping the specified object instances.
        In order to customize the object creation, the caller must employ an implementation of a FactoryContext as the invocation service.

        Note that the built routine results will be dispatched in the looper specified through the builder, thus, waiting for the outputs on the very same looper thread, immediately after its invocation, will result in a deadlock.
        By default output results are dispatched in the main looper.

        Parameters:
        context - the invocation context.
        target - the wrapped object class.
        Returns:
        the routine builder instance.
